nodes.bodyText: if we are not removing the model package, then better to leave CaseDetails in uk.gov.hmcts.ccd.domain.model where all the other domain classes are
in this particular case adding the Definitions suffix will make things a bit confusing because we are creating a display object. Possible to revert the method rename?
shall we rename the method names too?
shall we rename the method names too?
I think for consistency with the other domain classes better to leave these in domain.model?

commit.message: RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: Moved CaseDetails and DraftResponseToCaseDetailsBuilder to uk.gov.hmcts.ccd.domain.model package
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: reverted CaseDetails and DraftResponseToCaseDetailsBuilder to uk.gov.hmcts.ccd.domain.model.definition package
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename eventTriggerId to eventId
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename class CaseEvent to CaseEventDefinition
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename class CaseEvent to CaseEventDefinition
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename class StartEventTrigger to StartEventResult
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename class UICaseViewResource to CaseViewResource
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename class UIEventViewResource to CaseHistoryViewResource
RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename class UIBannerResource to BannerViewResource

RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: rename class UIStartTriggerResource to CaseUpdateViewEventResource
UIUserProfileResource to UserProfileViewResource
UIWorkbasketInputsResource to WorkbasketInputsViewResource

RDM-8217: Codebase Improvement: class UIJurisdiction renamed to JurisdictionView

nodes.bodyText: shall we rename Jurisdiction to JurisdictionDefinition?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,7 +13,7 @@ public JurisdictionDisplayProperties toResponse(Jurisdiction jurisdiction) {
         result.setId(jurisdiction.getId());

nodes.bodyText: shall we rename the method names too?
we should rename the method names here, otherwise it's confusing
we should rename the parameter too eventField to eventFieldDefinition
